transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir, aapne disconnect kar diya?
Customer: Nahi, maine nahi kara, ho gaya tha. 
Executive: To batao na sir. Maine bola tha 50,000 plus GST aur nahi teen saal ka karna hai to ₹60,000 le lo.
Executive: Achha, okay, okay, aapse WhatsApp pe baat ho rahi hai. Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai. Haan, sir.
Customer: Sir, nahi hai na, bol raha tha to main kyun bolta? Aapko thoda sa to aap check to karo last payment aap check kar lo na invoice aap check kijiye na sir ji, Maurya sahab. Last invoice theek hai, theek hai. Ji.
Executive: Haan. Dekhiye main isme na jyada time nahi lunga. Sirf 10 minute ka time lunga, 5 minute already use kar chuke. Isme na main jo previous ki baat kar rahe ho na, usko to main consider kaise karu?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Previous wali jo episode hai, wo aapko pata hi nahi hai.
Customer: Sir, bill ki baat kar rahe hain. Haan, main bill ki baat kar raha hu. Yahi baat jo hai kal bhi unhone mujhse ek ghanta jo hai Vivek ne bhi kara aur aap bhi usi baat ko le ja rahe ho. Pichhli baat to, pichhli baat to har saal sarasar cheating hui hai aur company ne cheating kari hai. Kya kar diya pichhli baar?
Customer: Aur usi baat ka agar maine kuch nahi karna hai. 50,000 plus GST do saal, 60,000 plus GST teen saal. Ye mera offer hai aur mujhe IndiaMART ka offer nahi chahiye koi sa bhi.
Customer: Main ye kah raha hu. Agar aapko jab aapko main pura baat batane ke liye main mere paas itna time nahi hai ki main din har aadmi ko ek baat batau. Totally cheating hui hai. Ek saal tak hume tang kiya gaya. Kya cheating? Ek aur din do minute mein bata sakte hain kya cheating hui is baar?
Customer: Vivek Vivek ko lagaiye. Vivek ne kara tha usko phone lagaiye aap.
Executive: Haan, theek hai.
Executive: To maine to aapko bheja tha na ek price sir. Aapne kiya nahi jo price bheja tha?
Customer: Hame aapke price se nahi matlab hai na koi. Hamari bhi price hai na. Aap karunga ki aap karoge?
Executive: Sir, to match karke to diya tha. Aapne dekha tha last baar jo bheja tha?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants resolution for past cheating incident.

- Refuses IndiaMART's offer, makes own offer.

- Claims harassment and cheating by IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect with Vivek.

- Executive mentioned about price sent earlier.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

cheating

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- cheating, price, gst, offer, invoice
